1.title: A Solo for Slash
1.plot: Whitestarr celebrates the launch of their indie record - but lead singer Cisco knows they can't get to the next level unless they can get a powerful manager, Carl Stubner, to represent them.

2.title: Riot on the Strip
2.plot: Cisco has co-written a hit song for his friend Mickey Avalon - now their new manager Stubner tells him that Whitestarr needs to come up with a hit song too.

3.title: Looking for Ms. Potato
3.plot: "The road is where bands break up," Stubner warns the band as they head off on a month-long cross-country tour.

4.title: Rock N' Roll Love Pickle
4.plot: Everybody's having girl problems. Cisco's breakup with Mischa makes him a target for paparazzi, while Rainbow's relationship with Danielle is shakier than ever after he moves back in with her.

5.title: The Fight for Fifth
5.plot: Tony Potato's role as Whitestarr's dancer winds up costing him his day job - as a lawyer at an upscale law firm.

6.title: Go Big or Go Home
6.plot: Rainbow is struggling with money troubles and a feeling that he doesn't really belong among the rich and tanned in Malibu.

7.title: Rockin' the Rabbit
7.plot: Rainbow's ballooning ego leads to a fight with Cisco after he hogs the stage at an important industry gig at the House of Blues.

imdb.plot outline: Led by singer/songwriter Cisco Adler, son of music mogul Lou Adler, Whitestarr has been kicking around the L.A. basin for seven years. They've been signed and dropped by Atlantic Records, and virtually ignored by the industry they hope to conquer. They've been in rehab, in the tabloids and in relationships with some of Hollywood's hottest starlets. The only place they haven't been is the Billboard charts. But with Roy Orbison's son on drums and a fleshy former lawyer named Tony Potato as backup dancer, Whitestarr is a rock and roll circus that's as much fun off-stage as they are on. Throw in an afro-ed axeman named Rainbow, and you've all the ingredients for the ultimate rock and roll cocktail. Get an insider's look at the backstage drama as these four rockers (and one dancer) fight to keep the band together and stop at nothing to realize their rock dream. It's going to be an uphill battle, and it's going to take more than a famous name to get there.
imdb.title: The Rock Life
